text: The Lankao South railway station is a railway station of Zhengzhou–Xuzhou High-Speed Railway in Lankao County, Henan, China. The station started operation on 10 September 2016, together with the Railway. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Henan Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Stations on the Xuzhou–Lanzhou High-Speed Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 2016 Category:Buildings and structures in Kaifeng
title: Lankao South railway station
